## SystemService.capabilities() method

Lists all available capabilities and features. This operation returns an instance of 'Capabilities' type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static capabilities(): CancelablePromise<Capabilities>;
```

**Returns:**

[CancelablePromise](./open-api-client.cancelablepromise.md)<!-- -->&lt;[Capabilities](./open-api-client.capabilities.md)<!-- -->&gt;
